page.title: 04ROWSLEY AND BEELEY
page.content: ROWSLEY AND BEELEY Rowsley and around Rowsley is slap bangin the middle of big houses and manners.Our village is'nt really in our block but part of our plot is in the Chatsworth grounds, we have the boat house,a wier and a few field of deer.The villages around here are ownded by rich Dukes like Pilsley and Beeley they are ownded by the Duke of Devenshire,who owns Chatsworth.Rowsley is in the Haddon grounds.The Duke of Rutland owns Haddon Hall and the grounds around Rowsley.We are also in the middle of Bakewell and Matlock and we have the A6 going throughto Derby.In the middle of summer we have people going to Chatsworth and going through to Rowsley ,we have the River Derwent running straight through our block.
